name: Danube
hint: Europe's second-longest river, flowing through 10 countries from Germany to the Black Sea

name: Rhine
hint: A major European river flowing from the Swiss Alps through Germany and the Netherlands to the North Sea

name: Volga
hint: The longest river in Europe, flowing through central Russia to the Caspian Sea

name: Thames
hint: A famous river flowing through London, England, to the North Sea

name: Seine
hint: A major river flowing through Paris, France, famous for its scenic banks

name: Elbe
hint: A major Central European river flowing from the Czech Republic through Germany to the North Sea

name: Po
hint: Italy's longest river, flowing eastward across the northern plains to the Adriatic Sea

name: Tagus
hint: The longest river on the Iberian Peninsula, flowing through Spain and Portugal to Lisbon

name: Loire
hint: The longest river in France, famous for the chateaux along its valley

name: Dnieper
hint: A major river flowing through Russia, Belarus, and Ukraine, passing through Kyiv
